author: bodhi
title: The untapped potential of eco-data
description: Ai lacks large quantities of granular ecological data and a means for people to implement climate solutions
solution: A system incentivising people to collect data from work that benefits the environment; a community built on this system can change the world
experience:
Combined 20yrs in forestry, overseen the planting of 27mil+ trees
Entrepreneurship, project management, industry connections, well-traveled
